label: 百萬塔
本: Jewel in the Ashes: Buddha Relics and Power in Early Medieval Japan . Harvard University Asia Center . 2000
説明文: Sets of 100,000 miniature wooden stūpas given by the government to each of 10 large temples of Nara in 770, commissioned by reigning empress Kōken (=empress Shōtoku; 718-70) for the stated purpose of protection of the state and confesssion of tnasgressions in the wake of the defeat of Fujiwara no Nakamaro.
